info.name: email
info.description: The email that is used to login to your pardot account.

info.name: password
info.description: The password used to login to your pardot account.

info.name: api_user_key
info.description: The user key that is found in the settings for your account.

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
